object.name: BotCommandScopeDefault
object.description: Represents the default scope of bot commands. Default commands are used if no commands with a narrower scope are specified for the user.
object.html_description: Represents the default scope of bot commands. Default commands are used if no commands with a narrower scope are specified for the user.
object.rst_description: Represents the default `scope <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#botcommandscope>`_ of bot commands. Default commands are used if no commands with a `narrower scope <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#determining-list-of-commands>`_ are specified for the user.
